Row.Text: Pleasure to see you again, friend. How can I help you?
You are always welcome here, friend. What is on your mind?
Hello, my friend. I hope you have come to benefit both our great nations?
It's great to see a friendly face. How may I help you?
Welcome, friend. Please stay. I shall have my servants prepare a wondrous feast to celebrate your arrival.
Today we meet, my friend. How can my glorious nation help you?
I had a feeling your friendly face would show up around here. What can my empire do to assist an honorable leader such as yourself?
My citizens have been pleased with contact from your empire. This can only benefit us both. Now, how may I help you?
Great to see a friend again. How may we help you?
You've come to the right place for diplomacy. What do you wish to discuss?
Hello, what business do you have with me today?
How can I help you? And how can you help me?
Hello there. I hope you come before me with honest intentions.
Hello there. May I present you with some of my finest wine while we converse?
How may I help you today?
Greetings. What affairs do you wish to discuss today?
Hello. How may I assist you today?
I have pressing matters to attend to. Do not waste my time here.
Your company is not welcome here. I pray you've made your visit to my land short.
You are wasting your time here. What could you possibly have to offer me?
Didn't I send your emissary away? You have a lot of nerve coming to visit me.
Don't test me. You are not in a position to afford more hostility with us. Now what do you want?
Speaking to you wasn't on my list of priorities today. What do you want with my time?
Oh, excellent. It's you. Tell me, why have you disgraced me with your uncouth stench?
You are undeserving of my time. Now, run along. So, why are you still here?
It's bad enough having to deal with your filth living in your own cove. Now you've dragged yourself to my presence?
I would show my respect and offer you wine, but you are an undeserving little brute that only deserves to be fed poison. Now, get on with it.
We must stop this fighting. Both our people cry out to end this senseless violence.
I am willing to negotiate a ceasefire, if you are. This war has gone on too long.
Failure to end this war now only makes you look more the villain. Please, end this madness and let's return to peace.
Isn't there a more civil way to end our hostilities?
Fighting only makes this world worse. We are not barbarians. We must stop acting as such.
Good leader, will you aid me in ending this tension? It is only my hope to build peace amongst our people.
We ask for nothing more than a return to sensibilities.
It's time to put the past behind us and settle our differences. Bloodshed is not the answer.
It's time we realize that the only thing we've accomplished here is exchanged grief for our lost loved ones. We must end this war, for our people's sake.
Did you really think you were going to get out of this one so easily? Be gone!
Why are you here? This is a joke, right?
It's time to face reality. I win, you lose.
There shall be no peace. All your cities shall belong to us.
It's time to face reality. I win, you lose.
Your land is filled with criminals, and I am their judge. Now get out of my sight, I have business to settle.
Do you hear that? That's the sound of your sinful crying out for salvation. Good thing I'm here.
I hope your scientists are working as hard as we are to fulfill our Research Agreement. I pray it becomes worth the money I spent.
Hail, mighty leader. Are you scientists hard at work completing our Research Agreement?
We spent a lot of gold on that Research Agreement. I hope a discovery is around the corner?
Nice to see you again, friend. I hope your empire is in stable condition. How may I help you?
Hail, friend! How may I assist your great nation today?
It's good to see you again, friend. Do you need something from me?
Greetings, friend. We have business to conduct, yes?
I am sick of {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. I hope someday he will be expelled from our lives.
I don't understand how villains like {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} can call their people civilized. They must be stupid, too.
Wouldn't you agree with me that {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is a problem to the entire world? We must tell the others about their sin.
You haven't been destroyed yet? I'm surprised. I thought you barbarians were easier to defeat than that. One can only hope.
You haven't been crushed under the might of your enemies yet? Maybe I'll have to step in. Wouldn't that be nice?
My advisors were just discussing your little war. I'm allowed to say we think it's pretty pathetic.
My empire's entertainers create many works about your little war. Let me be clear, your attempt at survival is kind of a joke.
Sorry to hear you are in distracted by war. Can I help you?
Send my regards to your men in combat. Now, how may I service you today?
Don't think I don't notice your military encroaching on my borders. If you want a fight, then come. Don't hide like a little coward.
I am not threatened by your troops. Attack me like the "great" leader you are, or get out of my sight.
My generals have noticed a large number of troops near my borders. I respectfully ask that you move them from my land, to keep my citizens happy. Now, did you have something to ask of me?

I want to remain on good terms with you, but the positioning of your military is making that extremely difficult. Please reconsider the placement of your troops or we may have to withdraw from diplomacy with you.
The expansion of your people is an annoyance to me and everyone who surrounds us. But I shouldn't have to worry, your buildings will probably erode from that filth you call a nation.

You remind me of a swarm of locusts. You anger everyone and continue to spread until you've left your devastation of civility upon the entire world. I can only hope you realize how great of a headache your expansion has become.

It seems as if your expansion has been noticed by one of my foreign advisors. They suspect that you may run out of room and may open up arms against my people. I urge you to slow your expansion. What say you?
Throwing your money into the land around you only gives me more territory to capture. I hope you understand this.
I appreciate a fair purchase occassionally, but the speed at which you are buying up the land around us is alarming. I urge you to reconsider before tension arises between our nations.
Your military is very powerful. I can only hope you will use your strength for good and not barbarism.
I've heard legends of great heroes and battles from your empire. Your enemies should fear the day you two cross paths.
My merchants have been pleased with visits to your great empire. Perhaps you'd like to teach them a few things about making money?
Your coffers are large, while mine remain empty. If you could teach my tax collectors how to maintain a large economy, I would be very appreciative.
I spoke out against you for a reason. Why do you bother me with your nonsense? Leave.
Not so angry now, are we? I'm not buying it. You're fake. Out of my sight.
An intriguing offer. While I appreciate the politeness, I haven't known you long enough to trust you yet. Perhaps some other time?.
You seem like a friendly leader, but I cannot attach myself to Alliances yet. Perhaps in the future?

You bathed me in lies and then stabbed me in the back! You are worth no one's attention. Out of my sight![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You remind me of a greedy child. You want too much of too many people and you end up with nothing. You are a liar and now everyone will know of your backstabbing ways.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You have shown your true colors. The only action I can take now is to warn others of your worthlessness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You are not worth anyone's time. Working with you was the biggest mistake of my life. I am destined not to repeat it.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You and your little friend {1_CivName} make me sick. I can't wait to see the day your empires burn in flames.
I will not stand around and play a fool, worm. If you want to fight, then fight.
I dare you to attack. Your cities will look grand decorated with my flags.
Do you wish to spill blood? Then come. I can't wait.
Didn't I warn you about your reckless expansion? This is a serious issue. Get away from my land, or else military action may follow. Understand?
You are a devil that deserves no recognition.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You are a foolish waste of time. Rot in your corner of the world, as I have no time for you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

Now the world knows that an idiot leads your pathetic nation. You will drive your people to an early extinction.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Our close borders have sparked too much tension. It is now time to see who stands victorious in combat.
It's time to expand my empire. I declare war on you with no regrets.
I still can't believe you thought I was your ally. Your ignorance will be your downfall.
Being friends was nice while it lasted, wasn't it? Sorry to break it to you, but you were merely a pawn in my grand strategy. Time to die.
Time to die, whelp. Playing the role as your friend was getting boring. It's time to assert my dominance.
I know I have a small chance at victory, but if I do not attack now, I will only face a stronger opponent in the future.
I'm happy to hear you understand our predicament. I hope we can continue our mutual understanding.
Thank you for your understanding. We shall not forget this.
I was so confident you would understand. You have disappointed my people.
Then out of my sight. You are a disgrace to my people.
Very well. I'm keeping an eye out for your armies, however.
Then see to it.
Pathetic whelp. Well, I guess I can't fault you. It's in your barbaric nature to make impudent decisions.
Honest or not, your foolish choices has left me with no respect for you. Now, our armies shall clash.
You may not be a coward, but that doesn't mean you're not a fool. You are a disgrace to all leaders.
You have betrayed our trust. I am disappointed.
If this is the way it must be, I shall destroy you and your wicked armies.
You have shown compassion where others have shown greed. For this, I applaud you.
By liberating our citizens, you have shown yourself to be a more trustworthy ally that I thought. I hope these good relations can continue.
I am blessed to receive my people again. You have my thanks.
You have returned these prisoners of war to me! This gesture shall not be forgotten.
Thank you for freeing my people. You are a kind-hearted and compassionate leader.
We should open a bottle of champagne to celebrate your kindness!
I am grateful for your selfless display.
Our people can only benefit from this. Thank you.
What deal will end our mutual suffering?
I am ready to listen to peace talks. What is your offer?
On behalf of my people, I urge you to reach a hasty agreement. What is the price for peace?
My advisors may tell me otherwise, but I'm the one in charge. I have little hope to win, but I must defeat you!

Set.Text: It is now my time. I will rise up to become king of kings. Lesser nations like yourself shall bow before my might!
I cannot ignore this chance to strengthen my people.

Row.Text: I'm curious to see your offer.
Please, make your offer.
Let's see your proposal.
While you settle uninhibited? No. I have a right to settle where I please.
Why not? If you don't like it - do something.
Of course not, you rude bastard! I'll keep this in mind. I don't want to conduct negotiations with a brute.
The future is shining ahead of us and my scientists are ready to explore the unknown! Will you aid us with a mutual Research Agreement?
One group of scientists is good. But imagine what two could accomplish? Will you assist us with a Research Agreement?
Exchange of these Luxury Resources would make both of our people happy. What say you?
Bad times have fallen over my people. I request your aid to assist us. Can you spare this for a friend?
Friends need to help each other out. I have fallen on hard times. Can you assist us? I shall not forget it.
I think the time has come to lay down our arms and negotiate peace. Will you sign a peace treaty with us?
We are not bloodthirsty barbarians. We must end this war while we still have our dignity. Will you accept this deal?
Today a child came up to me and told me his father was slaughtered by your men. His life was ruined. These people are our future. We must not betray them. Please, accept this peace offering.
Excellent. I look forward to an Alliance that will change the world.
I graciously accept, under the terms that we benefit both our nations and we fight the evil that lie outside our borders.

Set.Text: I don't know how your empire manages to remain afloat. You'd think your people would join an empire worth living in. Come to think of it, my nation would be a great destination!

Row.Text: People are starting to talk about you. They seem to think you favor genocide over civil human discussion.
You spread fear where you walk. The other nations are starting to get worried. I can't say the same for myself, I just think you're a babbling idiot.
Oh, great leader. I pray you can teach me the ways of leading a great empire such as yours.
Please, I beg you. Show mercy for my people, they do not wish to die.
You have broken my people to nothing. Their will is shattered, their homes ruined, families scattered. I can only hope you've come to end this madness before more innocents die.

Set.Text: An Alliance between two or more players means, in the most basic sense that these players now have a mutual interest in looking out for each other (typically this involves becoming trade partners and sharing resources). Players may also choose to establish blocks of Allies with multiple players in order to ensure long-term safety and economic stability.
{1_PlayerName} allied with {2_PlayerName}!
{1_CivName:textkey} and {2_CivName:textkey} formed an Alliance, forging a strong bond between the two empires.
{1_PlayerName} allied with {2_PlayerName}!
{1_CivName:textkey} and {2_CivName:textkey} formed an Alliance, forging a strong bond between the two empires.
Alliance Expired
Your Alliance with {1_LeaderName} ran its course and will need to be renewed.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]We are allies![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]We are allies with the same leaders![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You allied with one of their enemies![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You refused a request made by this player after forming an Alliance![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]We declared war on them while allied![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]We denounced them while allied![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You declared war on your allies![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You denounced your allies![ENDCOLOR]
Shall we form an Alliance?
An Alliance promotes friendly diplomacy and deters outside aggressors. Allies may request diplomatic or economic assistance, and failure to support your ally may upset them.
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like to form an Alliance, informing the other empires of the bond between our peoples. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to ally with us? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two empires.
Let us plant the seeds of a bright future by forming an Alliance. What say you?
This world can be cruel. Only with the assistance of others can we overcome it. Shall we announce to the world we are allies?

Row.Text: Hello, great leader. Will you ally with us to strengthen the bond of our empires?
Only by forming an Alliance can our empires truly be a feared force in our world. Will you join me in this honor?
I'm looking for a friend in this world. Will you ally with us?
Great leader, will you ally with us? It would make our friends sing for joy and enemies cower before our might.
It seems I have launched an attack on one of your city states. It should be no loss to you; they were probably planning on backstabbing you anyway.
Right now I am celebrating with a great feast. Launching an attack against your little city state was the best move I've made in years.
Oh, do you hear something? I think it may be the cries of your little protectorate. No worries, my men shall silence them soon.

My deepest regrets, but it seems that a protectorate of yours which you have had relations with in the past has been attacked by my armies. Rest assured, this decision was not made against you, but it was deemed a necessary course of action.
Forgive me, but my armies may have overstepped their boundaries and attacked a city-state that you've dealt with in the past. Will you please offer your forgiveness?

While my intention was not to sour relations with you, my armies have attacked a city-state in which have dealt with you in the past. I would like to repeat that this was not a hostile course of action towards you.

Set.Text: We'll expand wherever we please.
Our apologies, we'll refrain from settling near you.

Row.Text: I've noticed your borders have been expanding at an alarming rate. Settling cities near my territory could ruin any possibility of friendship for our nations.

Ancient histories of my people tell of a migration from the lands you currently occupy. We will let you keep the lands for now, but we shall not hesitate to take action if you expand further into the lands of our ancestors.

Set.Text: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]They believe your interests conflict with theirs, and they don't like it!
The leader you're speaking with has no desire to go to peace with this nation.
The other leader has no desire to go to peace with the leader you're speaking with.
The Richest Nations of the World
The Happiest Nations of the World
The Strongest Militaries of the World
The Most Productive Nations of the World
The Most Advanced Nations of the World
The Most Artistic Nations of the World

Row.Text: Plato
Aristotle
Magellan
Charles Dezobry
Louis Halphen
Barclay
Is total extermination what you really want? I beg you to spare us.
This war has destroyed us. I cannot offer you anything more than peace now. Please, show mercy.
My people have no chance of survival. Our fate is in your hands, now. Please, spare us.
You have reduced my empire to nothing more than a glorified pile of rubble. I beg you to allow us to rebuild. For the sake of our relations.
Greetings, great leader! You are the mighty leader that Hermes said would enter my presence?
May the Gods be with us both, great leader. I am Alexander III, king of almighty Greece! I am honored to meet you.
Greetings, strange one! I am Alexander, ruler of the mighty Greeks! I pray that you dine with the Olympians, and scorn the Titans.
By the glory of God, I greet you. I am Askia, ruler of the mighty Songhai. May our two nations live together in peace.
Greetings, great leader. I hope you are as learned a fellow as I am. May the grace of God keep our two nations from conflict.
Greetings! I am Askia of the fearless Songhai. I pray that you are a good friend and not a pitiful enemy.
Please, come closer. My name is Augustus Caesar, Emperor of the glorious empire of Rome. I pray you are a trustworthy leader.
The Roman people greet you. I am Augustus, Emperor of this mighty nation. Someday, my nation will grow to be the largest the world has ever seen!
Welcome to Rome, great leader. I shall serve our finest wine to celebrate the meeting of our two nations.
Welcome, great leader. The mighty nation of Germany greets you. My name is Bismarck. I pray your dealings with the German people are only positive.
Germany welcomes you to our land, stranger. I, Otto van Bismarck, hope that our nations will stay on good terms and benefit from this meeting..
I greet thee, Stranger. Welcome to Germany. My name is Bismarck. Would you like a taste of this exquisite wine?
Hail, Stranger. I am Catherine, empress of Russia. I hope we can get along well.
Hail, great leader. Welcome to glorious land of Russia. Our people are brave, and the men here are incredible! If your subjects are anything like mine, then we shall be the envy of the world!
Excellent to meet you, great leader. How can the beautiful Russian people service you?
Hail, leader. I am Darius of mighty Persia. Our people will be the envy of the world someday.
Greetings, leader. My name is Darius, mighty king of Persia! I can only hope that you will prove to be a beneficial ally.
Welcome to Persia, Stranger. I am Darius. Stay within your boundaries and our relationship should be fine.
England greets you, leader. I am Queen Elizabeth. How may we help you?
Well met. I hope you prove useful to England.
Excellent to see another face in this world. I am Elizabeth, Queen of mighty England.
Greetings, fellow equal! Let us sing in reverence to our newfound acquintance!
Hail, leader. Have you come to spread the word of peace to the world?
Greetings. I am Gandhi, of the peaceful India. I pray our two nations will come together and further our nations.
By the grace of all that is glorious, I, Harun-al-Rashid, welcome you to the Arabian land.
Please, have a seat, great leader. I am Harun-al-Rashid, and history will forever remember this meeting.
Welcome to Arabia, great leader. My name is Harun-al-Rashid. How can I help you today?
The spirits have foretold your arrival, great leader.
Greetings. I am Hiawatha, leader of the mighty Iroquois. I hope you share our love for nature.
Hail, Stranger! The spirits have said many things about your people, and I am glad to have finally met you.
Ah! Who are you and why do you dare to present yourself to the mighty Montezuma?
I am Montezuma, leader of the great Aztecs! And you? You are just one of my many subjects.
Beware, Stranger! There are always sacrifices that must be made in Montezuma's empire!
Do you wish to ally yourself with mighty Montezuma, Stranger? Send me your weak, your strong, your women and children! We shall spill blood in our gods' name!
France welcomes you, Stranger. I am Napoleon, feared general in all the world! Pray you remain France's ally.
Greetings, stranger. I am Napoleon, of France. The French shall not falter to anyone, keep this in mind.
Greetings. I am Napoleon, and my people are fearless and brave. You can only hope yours are, too.

Set.Text: How dare you demand tribute from me!

Row.Text: Oh, I'm sure you've heard! My French armies rush out of the trees and from atop hills to destroy you once and for all!
Hail, leader. I hope you are as honorable and brave as I am.
Welcome to Japan. I am Oda Nobunaga. I pray that you will remain a loyal companion, or a worthy adversary.
I am Oda Nobunaga, and I welcome you to the great empire of Japan. May your stay here be tranquil and engaging.
Greetings, mortal. I am Ramesses, pharoah of glorious Egypt. Have you come to bow before my transcendence?
I am Ramesses, and you have entered the presence of my infinite divinity.
Welcome to Siam, stranger! I am Ramkhamhaeng, king of these glorious people!
Hail, great leader! Welcome to Siam. You are welcome to visit my garden whenever you please.
Greetings! Welcome to Siam. Be warned, the wicked are not welcome in my land.
I greet you, Stranger! I hope you prove to be a worthy leader!
Hail, great leader! I greet you and welcome you to my court! I am Suleiman, leader of the Ottomans!
Welcome to the Ottoman Empire, leader! I am pleased to meet you!
America greets you, leader. I hope you are a ruler of freedom and prosperity.
Welcome to America, Stranger. I am Washington, great ruler of the free world. How may we aid you?
Hello, leader. Welcome to America, land of the free and home of the brave. Now, tell me, what worth do you have for us?
Greetings! I am Wu Zetian, of China. How may my people help you today?
This meeting will be celebrated by our descendants to come! Welcome to China, Stranger!
Greetings! How may I, Wu Zetian of mighty China, aid you and your foreign people?
Our people demand a lavish lifestyle. Wouldn't you agree?
Agree to this deal and it will make the subjects of both our lands much happier.
It's time we traded our luxuries to provide a better life for our people. Wouldn't you agree?
First I had to deal with {1_CivName}, now I have to deal with you? Pathetic. You're both the reason why this world is such a wretched hive of scum and villany.
How nice. It seems you and {1_CivName} are allies. It's fine, because I will crush you both under the strength of my empire.

I'm sorry, but the rate of expansion amongst your people is troubling to me. I understand your desires to expand your influence, but our people are getting alarmed and feel threatened. I only ask if you would slow down and leave some room for us all, then we can all get along better. Do you agree?
Keep wasting your money on worthless land purchases. You probably can't even keep them safe from wild animals, no less the armies of those who hate you.

It seems you have been purchasing land around our territory far too quickly. My subjects do not appreciate this. I urge you to cease your actions, for the sake of both our people and to ease our tensions.
Why have you come? To beg for peace? No! My armies will drive your cities to ground, women and children first!
I shall never stop until your wicked are destroyed.
Get away! This war shall continue until I am ready to give you mercy!
Hail, friend! What do you require of my empire?
Nice to see you again. Have you come to request a trade?
It's great to see a friend, again. What matters shall we discuss today?
I'm listening.
Well? Let's hear your proposal.
I'm sorry, I don't think this deal can work.
There doesn't seem to be a logical way to make this deal.
I'm sorry, I can't see a fair deal anywhere on this offer.
No, I'm sorry. This deal just can't work.
That's the best you can offer? What do you take me for, a fool?
Come on, you'll need to do better if you want to get a deal done.
I could not shame my people with such an outrageous deal. You'll have to do better than that.
I cannot accept this deal. Please put more on the table.
This deal isn't good for my interests. Offer more and we can have a fair deal.
I think you have to offer a little more for this deal to work. But as it stands now, this is not acceptable.
This deal will go a long way to making us friends again.
We will not forget this deal, I promise you this.
This deal is done, then. May our trade continue into the future.
Then the terms are set. This was a fair deal.
I agree to this deal. It is fair for both parties involved.
I cannot refuse this generous offer of yours. Thank you.
You have sacrificed your goods to make our relationship better. For this, I applaud you.
Your generosity has not gone unnoticed. Thank you.
We will remember this deal for years to come. Thank you for being so generous.
Shall we open up our borders to make way for future trade and convenience?
I think it's in our best interests, as civilized nations of this world, to open our borders up and let our friendship thrive. What say you?
Let us open our borders to each other. It will only lead to increased friendship.
Let's be real. You've got something I want, and you don't hand it over, you can expect to see my troops knocking on your door.
Give me what I want, and your women and children shall remain safe. That sounds like a good deal, don't you think?
